task-wr.title: Setting Up the Example Guest Image
task-wr.shortdesc: You can import guest images for use with the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade.

context.p: This example assumes that a guest disk image named example-guest.img is available on the file system of the active controller. The guest image is available as part of the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade product on WindShare or on the product DVD.
The image must be uploaded to Glance, the OpenStack image deployment service, so that it can be used to launch new virtual machines.

step.cmd: List the images available on the system.

info.p: Select Images in the System Panel section of the Admin tab to open the Images page.
